sentences: In informal consultations, the GEF responded to parties questions on financial support provided for the preparation of non-Annex I national communications ( FCCC/SBI/2008/INF.3/Rev.1 ).
Parties thereafter made progress in agreeing text on the agenda sub-item on the provision of financial and technical support.
Informal consultations will continue on Tuesday.
enb_long_title: Twenty-eighth Sessions of the UNFCCC Subsidiary Bodies, Second Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Convention, and fifth Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Kyoto Protocol
